answers.answer: Im 26 weeks too and only gained 8 pounds as well, i spoke with my doctor on Monday and she said thats fine as long as the baby is healthy and growing. The baby will get all ghe nutrients she needs. So don't be too worried? Did you do ur gestational diabetes check yet?
It is normal. To gain or lose, no matter the number. Just as long as you dont gain or lose too much weight, you and your baby are fine.
I go next week for the glucose test.

I gained 2 pounds until 30 weeks and after that I packed on more. I'm currently 37+1 and i gained 15 pounds at my 34 week appt. And then Monday I went back for my 36 week appt and she said I lost 5 pounds. She just said to eat more but I've been nauseous so it's hard
I'm starting to get nauseas again as well :/ I had a horrible first trimester.
Mee too I know how you feel
Be happy! I gained it all towards the end of my second trimester and boy was it a lot. I think ive gained 25 lbs and im only 29 weeks. I just keep growing!!  Everyone's different !

question: I'm 26 weeks pregnant an haven't  really gained any weight.  Is that normal? I think I've gained a total of 8 pounds so far.
title: Weight
